metadata.title: CVE-2024-28583 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in open source FreeImage v.3.19.0 [r1909]allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code via the readLine()function when reading images in XPM format.

criterions.comment: freeimage package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2025-01-16').
